attributes.action: Hold a Vote of No Confidence
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, petition Parliament to hold a vote of no confidence, after George Osbourne's spending cuts have left the economy struggling to grow, and after university fees were ideologically increased under the guise of being to cut costs, despite the fact that the money gained from increasing tuition fees will not be gained until after the government deadline for debt repayment of 2014.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament not the Government
